des:
Introducing Comfort My Dog - The ultimate solution to calm your furry friend!

Comfort My Dog is an Alexa skill designed to help your dog feel more relaxed, calm, and happy. If your dog is experiencing anxiety or stress, this skill provides them with soothing music and sounds that will help them feel more at ease and sleep better.

Listening to this music will help your dog feel more relaxed and calm, less anxious, sleep more, and be generally happier. Playing this music is a great way to ensure that your best furry friend feels relaxed. If you feel a bit stressed out yourself, you will enjoy these soothing sounds yourself. It's very relaxing all around :) 

GOLD MEMBERSHIP:
+ Premium audio quality
+ Longer sound loop
+ Unlimited hours of music

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Comfort My Dog when you need your dog to be relaxed. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:

1. On the Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap “When this happens” to choose the trigger. For example, you can select Voice and then type “Comfort My Dog”
5. Tap “Add action” and choose “Skills”
6. Choose "Your Skills" and Select Comfort My Dog
7. Choose the Device to perform the routine and hit SAVE.

When you're ready to relax, say, “Alexa, Comfort My Dog”

Also, try our other skill 
 - Calm My Cat
 - Relax My Pet
 - Dog Sleep Music

SUPPORT/ FEEDBACK

Website: https://voicegames.ai 

MORE INFO
The skill features especially crafted music to soothe dogs and give them a sense of calmness. The music is soft and gentle and known to be calming for dogs and help them feel more at peace.

Using Comfort My Dog is easy. Ask Alexa to "Open, Comfort My Dog" and the music will start playing. It's perfect for when your dog needs to nap or have a quiet time during the day. The skill is perfect for when you're away from home and your dog is anxious or stressed. It can also be used when your dog is sleeping to help them have a more peaceful and restful sleep.

It's compatible with Alexa-enabled devices, making it easy to control the music from anywhere in your home. Overall, Comfort My Dog is the perfect solution for dog owners who want to ensure their dog is relaxed and calm, even when they're not around. Whether your dog is experiencing anxiety or stress or needs quiet time, this skill is the perfect solution. 

So why not enable "Comfort My Dog" today and see the difference for yourself? Your Dog will love you for it!
